Chapter 2 Model Building 2.1 Earth algorithm mars2 <- earth(INS ~ ., data = train,glm = list(family = binomial)) summary(mars2) evimp(mars2) library(InformationValue) #ROC curve #validation ROC mars_val<-predict(mars2,newdata=val,type="response") plotROC(val$INS,mars_val)
